name: Office Life - Prologue
description:
Made in Renp'y originally for a jam a while back but I never got to finish it in time, so I just used this as a means to practice writing and just to have fun with what the engine can do.

It's a slice of life pixel art point and click VN. nothing fancy but it did give me a bunch of ideas for a future version of the game, has three endings but I hope people enjoy it as much as I had fun writing it.

But yeah I'm planning to remake the game again but in RPGMaker and put it out as a demo, whilst I had fun using Renp'y a lot of the ideas I wanted to do is more accessible in that engine (for example, walking around inside and outside of the office and to add more cool mechanics that I'm throwing around in my head) I want to also rewrite a lot of things and do my own music.

Additional Credits:

  • Door SFX I got from https://www.freesoundeffects.com/free-sounds/doors-10030/
  • For the character profile pictures you see in game, I generated the backgrounds for them using https://www.heropatterns.com/ 
  • I got all the BGM from DOVA-SYNDROME https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCq15_9MvmxT1r2-LLjtkokg
